entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Prévost
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:24 p.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 4.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Montréal-Mirabel Int'l Airport 7:00 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 4.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 40 km
Humidity: 67 %
Dewpoint: -1.3°C
Wind: WSW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Monday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few rain showers and flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
